lattice

Class ImplicationalSystemReaderText

  • java.lang.Object
    • lattice.ImplicationalSystemReaderText

  • public final class ImplicationalSystemReaderText
extends java.lang.Object

    This class defines the way for reading an implicational system from a text file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ImplicationalSystemReaderText()

        public static void register()

      • read

        public void read(ImplicationalSystem system,
        java.io.BufferedReader file)
          throws java.io.IOException

        Saves this component in a file.

        The following format is used:

        An implicational system can be instancied from and save to a text file in the following format: A list of elements separated by a space in the first line ; then, each rule on a line, written like [premise] -> [conclusion] where elements are separated by a space.

        a b c d e
a b -> c d
c d -> e
        Parameters:
        system - a system to read
        file - a file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an IOException occurs
